title: In Illustrissimum, ac Serenissimum, Jacobum II, Regem Magnae Britaniae, Franciae, & Hiberniae, &c. cum publice coronam regalem indueret carmen epiphōnētikon A panegyrick poem on the coronation of the Illustrious and Serene, James II, King of Great Britain, France, and Ireland, &c.
author: Ker, Patrick, fl. 1691.
notes: Written by Patrick Ker. Cf. DNB.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
